00012 #include <QStringList>
00013 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00014 
00015 #include <QDebug>

00017 FileSetEditor::FileSetEditor(const QFileInfo& baseLocation,
00018                                                          QSharedPointer<Component> component, 
00019                                                          void* dataPointer,
00020                                                          QWidget *parent):
00021 ItemEditor(component, parent),
00022 baseLocation_(baseLocation),
00023 fileSet_(0), nameBox_(this), 
00024 groups_(tr("Group identifiers"), this, QStringList()),
00025 dependencies_(tr("Dependent directories"), baseLocation_, this, QStringList()) {
00026 
00027         fileSet_ = static_cast<FileSet*>(dataPointer);
00028         Q_ASSERT_X(fileSet_, "FileSetEditor::setDataPointer",
00029                 "static_cast failed to give valid FileSet-pointer");
00030 
00031         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00032 
00033         // connect the signals informing of data changes
00034         layout->addWidget(&nameBox_);
00035         connect(&nameBox_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00036                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00037         connect(&nameBox_, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)),
00038                 this, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00039 
00040         layout->addWidget(&groups_);
00041         connect(&groups_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00042                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00043 
00044         layout->addWidget(&dependencies_);
00045         connect(&dependencies_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00046                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00047 
00048         // set the values for the nameGroupBox
00049         nameBox_.setName(fileSet_->getName());
00050         nameBox_.setDisplayName(fileSet_->getDisplayName());
00051         nameBox_.setDescription(fileSet_->getDescription());
00052 
00053         // set the items for the groups list
00054         groups_.setItems(fileSet_->getGroups());
00055 
00056         // set the items for the dependencies list
00057         dependencies_.setItems(fileSet_->getDependencies());
00058 }
00059 
00060 FileSetEditor::~FileSetEditor() {
00061 }
00062 
00063 bool FileSetEditor::isValid() const {
00064 
00065         return nameBox_.isValid();
00066 }
00067 
00068 void FileSetEditor::removeModel() {
00069         QSharedPointer<Component> component = ItemEditor::component();
00070         component->removeFileSet(fileSet_->getName());
00071         fileSet_ = 0;
00072 }
00073 
00074 void FileSetEditor::makeChanges() {
00075         // if widget is in invalid state then don't apply the changes
00076         if (!isValid()) {
00077                 return;
00078         }
00079 
00080         fileSet_->setName(nameBox_.getName());
00081         fileSet_->setDisplayName(nameBox_.getDisplayName());
00082         fileSet_->setDescription(nameBox_.getDescription());
00083 
00084         fileSet_->setGroups(groups_.items());
00085 
00086         fileSet_->setDependencies(dependencies_.items());
00087 }
